name: Operation: Escape (AoSkye)
description:
An educational point-and-click co-op game that is set in a mad scientist's lab. You play as 2 detectives that went to investigate the lab of the infamous scientist, Jan Smit, that has gone missing. Upon entering the door locks behind you and you only have 6 minutes to escape! 

Industry Project game for Semester 4 by the Escapey boys.
